speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Thank you for calling ISS Insurance Ltd. My name is Sarah. How can I help you today?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: Need travel insurance details.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Okay, I can help with that. I just need to gather some details about your trip and what you require coverage for. Could you tell me where you'll be traveling to?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: Japan.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: And how long will your trip be?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: 2 weeks.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Traveling from Singapore, correct?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: Yes.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: And how many people will be traveling?

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Thank you. Could you share the age group of the travelers? For example, 18-25, 26-40?

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Noted. Are there any specific activities you plan to participate in during your trip, like skiing or scuba diving?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: No special activities planned. Just sightseeing.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Okay. To ensure we find the right policy, could you tell me what aspects of the trip you want to make sure are covered? Any particular concerns?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: Need cover if trip is cancelled. Also if luggage is lost or damaged. Medical emergencies. Flight delays causing extra cost.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Alright, so cover for trip cancellation, lost or damaged luggage, medical emergencies, and travel delays.

speaker: Customer
dialogue: Yes.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Any pre-existing medical conditions we should be aware of, like asthma or high blood pressure?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: No pre-existing conditions.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: And will you be traveling with any special medical equipment, such as a CPAP machine or wheelchair?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: No special medical equipment needed.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Understood. Is there anything else, perhaps any specific situations you're concerned about for this trip?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: Yes. Need cover for pet hotel costs if return flight to Singapore is delayed. Have a cat.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Okay, cover for additional pet accommodation costs due to travel delay on return. Noted. Do you have a budget range in mind for the insurance premium?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: Flexible.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Alright. Let me just summarize the requirements I've noted down. You're looking for travel insurance for two adults, age group 26-40, traveling from Singapore to Japan for 2 weeks. You require standard coverage for medical emergencies, trip cancellation, lost or damaged luggage, and travel delays. No specific sports or adventure activities planned, and no pre-existing conditions or special medical equipment. Additionally, you specifically require coverage for potential extra pet hotel costs for your cat should your return to Singapore be delayed. Is that all correct?

speaker: Customer
dialogue: Yes, correct.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: Thank you. I have recorded all your requirements. We will use this information to identify suitable policy options for you. Someone from our team will be in touch shortly with quotes and details.

speaker: Customer
dialogue: Okay, thanks. Goodbye.

speaker: Customer Service Agent
dialogue: You're welcome. Thank you for calling ISS Insurance. Goodbye.
